Papers by publisher

Generate a summary by publisher. Know publishers: OTC, SPE, etc.

papers_by_publisher(url)

Arguments

url

a OnePetro query URL

Examples

#
# Example
my_url <- make_search_url(query = "shale gas", how = "all")
papers_by_publisher(my_url)
#> # A tibble: 20 x 2
#>                                                     name value
#>                                                    <chr> <dbl>
#>  1                          American Petroleum Institute     3
#>  2                   American Rock Mechanics Association   327
#>  3                  American Society of Safety Engineers     2
#>  4               Carbon Management Technology Conference    12
#>  5         International Petroleum Technology Conference   235
#>  6              International Society for Rock Mechanics    89
#>  7 International Society of Offshore and Polar Engineers    26
#>  8                                    NACE International    18
#>  9                 National Energy Technology Laboratory    19
#> 10                     Offshore Mediterranean Conference    30
#> 11                        Offshore Technology Conference    95
#> 12                                  Oil Industry Journal     2
#> 13                           Petroleum Society of Canada    62
#> 14                    Pipeline Simulation Interest Group     3
#> 15                  Society of Exploration Geophysicists   334
#> 16                        Society of Petroleum Engineers  5346
#> 17      Society of Petrophysicists and Well-Log Analysts   224
#> 18                      Society of Underwater Technology     1
#> 19        Unconventional Resources Technology Conference   644
#> 20                              World Petroleum Congress    51
